titleStmt.title: Some cautions offered to the consideration of those who are to chuse members to serve in the ensuing Parliament
Cautions to those who are to chuse members to serve in Parliament
titleStmt.author: Halifax, George Savile, Marquis of, 1633-1695.

notesStmt.note: Written by George Savile, Marquis of Halifax. Cf. BM.
Published also as: Cautions to those who are to chuse members to serve in Parliament.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
